species.name: sigilyph
descriptions: A discovery was made in the desert where Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been an ancient city were found beneath the sands.
Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians’ emissaries.
The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.

abilities.name: wonder-skin
abilities.effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

abilities.name: magic-guard
abilities.effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

abilities.name: tinted-lens
abilities.effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
